languages.text: "Бог-Император — ложь! Астрономикон — ложь! Мы все сгинем!"

traits.locale_text: "Безобразные твари! Возвращайтесь в пучину, из которой вылезли! Именем Императора, изыди!"

languages.text: "The God-Emperor is a lie! The Astronomican is a lie! We are all going to perish!"
languages.original_text: "Бог-Император — ложь! Астрономикон — ложь! Мы все сгинем!"

languages.text: «¡El Dios Emperador es una farsa! ¡El Astronomicón es un engaño! ¡Vamos a morir todos!».
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor is a lie! The Astronomican is a lie! We are all going to perish!"

traits.locale_text: «¡El Dios Emperador es una farsa! ¡El Astronomicón es un engaño! ¡Vamos a morir todos!».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下など嘘だ！星辰波など嘘だ！我々は皆、滅びるのだ!！」
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor is a lie! The Astronomican is a lie! We are all going to perish!"

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下など嘘だ！星辰波など嘘だ！我々は皆、滅びるのだ!！」

languages.text: “神皇是个谎言！星炬也是个谎言！我们全都要死在这里了！”
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor is a lie! The Astronomican is a lie! We are all going to perish!"

traits.locale_text: “神皇是个谎言！星炬也是个谎言！我们全都要死在这里了！”

languages.text: "Der Gottimperator ist eine Lüge! Das Astronomican ist eine Lüge! Wir werden alle sterben!"
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor is a lie! The Astronomican is a lie! We are all going to perish!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Gottimperator ist eine Lüge! Das Astronomican ist eine Lüge! Wir werden alle sterben!"

languages.text: « L'Empereur-Dieu est un mensonge ! L'Astronomican est un mensonge ! Nous allons tous mourir ! »
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor is a lie! The Astronomican is a lie! We are all going to perish!"

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator yalan! Astronomikan yalan! Hepimiz ölüme mahkûmuz!"
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor is a lie! The Astronomican is a lie! We are all going to perish!"
